ygData.subject: Qeynos trainer location & armor tailored free!
ygData.msgSnippet: I m playing a 6th level Dwarven Paladin named Kaladin (stop that snickering! It was randomly generated! LOL!)  and I m currently playing in the Qeynos area.
ygData.messageBody:
I'm playing a 6th level Dwarven Paladin named Kaladin (stop that snickering!
It was randomly generated! LOL!) and I'm currently playing in the Qeynos
area. It turns out there ARE trainers for us in Qeynos - it took me a while
to find them - they are thru the passageway to the right of the arena
entrance. Also, if you see I'm on in the game (/who kaladin all) I'd be
glad to tailor up some patchwork for my fellow paladins! This will save you
from having to put those valuable practice points into a skill that gets (in
my limited experience) used very rarely once you have a set of armor. I
already spent 'em, already got my own armor, and don't mind helping you to
save your valuable training points. Patchwork helps you take less damage in
combat!

Please bring your own pelts & patterns, otherwise I'll help you hunt down
the pelts & patterns (6sp, 6cp per pattern from the NPC merchant). This
helps me meet fellow paladins, maybe provides a little adventure from Lion,
Wolf, and Bear hunting, and helps keep yer hide intact with no practice
points and very little silver spent.

Keep the faith & Bring Pride on Our Guild, Brothers & Sisters!

______________________________________________________________________

Gary Long, Vice President, Valley Internet Services
